text: Captain George Alexander Waters (1820-1903) was a British Navy officer. He served on the Vixen, the Jupiter, the Simoom, and the Shannon, which he first commanded while Sir William Peel led the Naval Brigade, before taking permanent command. He was later Queen's Harbour Master, firstly at Malta and finally at Sheerness, before retiring in 1876. He is buried at Kensal Green Cemetery. ==References== Category:1820 births Category:1903 deaths Category:Burials at Kensal Green Cemetery
title: George Alexander Waters
